name: Pumpkin Juice
description:
PUMPKIN JUICE is my first game jam game, made in a weekend in September 2021 for Mini Jam 89. The theme was pumpkin, so I went a little gourd-crazy. PUMPKIN JUICE is a "Lemonade Stand"-esque business management sim game.

The one thing that the Headless Horseman has missed more than anything else since losing his head is the delicious, autumn-y taste of pumpkin juice. Because he can never again enjoy his favorite beverage, Headless has decided to share the drink with his neighborhood (and maybe make a dollar or two on the side).

Help Headless make his passion, pumpkin juice, a full-time career that he can survive on, while helping others discover and delight in this exquisite seasonal brew.
